Pricing.Name: Free
Pricing.Description: No credit card required. 1 live SDK (any language). Up to 50 endpoints. Automatic updates & releases. Custom changes to limited files only.

Pricing.Name: Startup
Pricing.Description: Choose from all available SDK languages. Up to 50 endpoints. Automatic updates & releases. Custom code (up to +1,000 lines added). Free for FOSS projects.

Pricing.Name: Business
Pricing.Description: Annual billing. 5 live SDKs included. Up to 150 endpoints. Slack developer support. Automated SDK migration support.

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: All available SDKs. Any API size. Enterprise support and SLAs. Fully managed SDK service. Advanced functionality, e.g. Streaming.

Pricing.Name: Get Started for Free
Pricing.Description: Access to latest version of basic SDK generation. Put 1 SDK in production today. Unlimited generations. Access to our OpenAPI toolchain. Community Slack support and Public Roadmap

Pricing.Name: Scale-Up
Pricing.Price: $250 / month per language SDK $500 / month per Terraform Provider
Pricing.Description: Up to 5 languages. Automated SDK generation and publishing in your GitHub org. Integrate with your docs

Pricing.Name: Business
Pricing.Price: $500 / month per language SDK $1000 / month per Terraform Provider
Pricing.Description: Everything from Scale Up +. Custom Code Support, Event Streaming and Test Generation. SLAs for service

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: Everything from Business +. All features and all languages. Tailored onboarding and migration service. Enterprise support: dedicated Slack channel, service and support SLAs. Early access to new language targets and features

Notes: Most direct competitor. Raised $15M Series A led by GV in October 2024, indicating a competitive and rapidly evolving space.

Pricing.Name: Free
Pricing.Description: Ideal for teams exploring our platform. Up to 5 SDK builds per month at no cost

Pricing.Name: Starter
Pricing.Description: Perfect for growing teams. Unlimited SDK builds in all supported languages

Pricing.Name: Advanced
Pricing.Description: For teams with comprehensive needs. Unlimited SDK builds in all supported languages, professional services, and full support with tailored pricing

Notes: Similar to Speakeasy and Stainless, focuses on SDK generation and management

Pricing.Name: N/A
Pricing.Description: N/A

Notes: Open-source tool for generating SDKs (and other outputs) from OpenAPI specs

Pricing.Name: Hobby
Pricing.Description: For individual hobbyists. Beautiful out of the box. Single editor. Custom domain. WYSIWYG editor. Built-in components library. In-app search. API playground. Third party integrations

Pricing.Name: Pro
Pricing.Description: For small teams and startups. Everything in Hobby, plus. 5 editors. AI chat responses. Advanced analytics. AI assistant writer. Chat analytics. Custom subpaths /docs. User feedback

Pricing.Name: Growth
Pricing.Description: For growing companies. Everything in Pro, plus. 20 editors. Custom CSS + JS. Preview deployments. Password-protection. Grammar and styling checks. Remove Mintlify branding. Increased AI chat credits

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: For those needing an enterprise-grade solution. Everything in Growth, plus. End-user authentication. Multiple products. Custom homepage. SSO login. 99.99% uptime SLA. Support SLA. Security and legal review

Notes: Focuses on creating and user-friendly API documentation

Pricing.Name: Free - 1 User
Pricing.Description: Unlimited Workspaces. Free Subdomains. API References (OpenAPI). Fully Stylable with Themes. Custom CSS/Javascript. Built in Scalar API Client

Pricing.Name: Pro - $12 Seat
Pricing.Description: Everything in Free. Custom Domains. Sync with GitHub. Guides & Versions. Search (by TypeSense). Priority Support

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: Everything in Pro. Priority Support. SSO/SAML. Monthly Audit of Docs. Verified Workspaces. Dedicated Slack Channel

Notes: Provides API documentation with a built-in, interactive API client.

Pricing.Name: Free
Pricing.Description: Create a foundation using your API reference. OAS/Swagger Support. API Versions. Advanced Request History

Pricing.Name: Startup
Pricing.Description: For small teams who want to build out their docs and create a community. Custom Domain. Guides. Changelog. Discussion Forum

Pricing.Name: Business
Pricing.Description: For multi-role teams who want advanced styling and basic management tools. Custom CSS/HTML. Reusable Content. Export Metrics Data. Statuspage Integration

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: For organizations looking to build scalable docs with multi-project management and security needs. Custom JS. Staging Environment. SSO & User Permissions. Public & Private APIs. Content Writing & Design

Notes: Popular platform for creating and hosting API documentation, interactive features

Pricing.Name: Pro
Pricing.Description: Start building your project with. Reunite. Custom domain hosting. 1 Project. 100 Pages

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: Everything included in Pro, plus. 500 Pages. SSO. Guest SSO. RBAC

Pricing.Name: Enterprise+
Pricing.Description: Everything included in Enterprise, plus. Data residency options. Sales-assistance. Procurement forms. Security questionnaires. Pay-by-invoice / PO process. Legal reviews. Single-tenant hosting options. Premium support and professional services options

Notes: Offers an open-source documentation tool (Redoc) and a suite of commercial API documentation products.

Pricing.Name: Basic
Pricing.Description: Design an API as an individual. First 3 users free. OpenAPI/JSON schema visual designer. Interactive docs. Instant mock servers

Pricing.Name: Startup
Pricing.Description: Build an API program for small teams. First 8 users free. Private projects. Multi-branch support. Custom domains, theming and favicon. Google Analytics integration. Approved email domains

Pricing.Name: Pro Team
Pricing.Description: Govern APIs across your organization. First 15 users free. Up to 20 teams. Shared style guides. Workspace groups. Remove Stoplight branding. Self-hosted Git providers. Activity logs. LDAP & SAML SSO. Component Libraries

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: Your API program at scale. Please contact sales to get a quote on pricing. Custom pricing. Unlimited projects and teams. Custom payment terms. Invoicing. Priority support

Notes: API design, development, and documentation platform, supports OpenAPI

Pricing.Name: N/A
Pricing.Description: Offers both open-source tools and commercial products. SwaggerHub (commercial) has tiered pricing based on users and features.

Notes: Ecosystem incumbent. Suite of tools for designing, building, documenting, and testing APIs (OpenAPI)

Pricing.Name: Free
Pricing.Description: For individuals or a small team of 3 or less to start testing APIs. Up to 3 collaborators. Access to API Client. Cloud-based integrations. 3 Packages. 30 day collection recovery. 25 collection runs. Access to Flows. 50 free activities in Postbot

Pricing.Name: Basic
Pricing.Description: API collaboration for a single team. Everything in Free, plus: Unlimited collaborators. 10,000 Mock Server requests. 10,000 Monitor requests. Additional pay-as-you-go capabilities

Pricing.Name: Professional
Pricing.Description: API collaboration for larger teams, cross-org, and external partners. Everything in Basic, plus: Private Workspaces. Single & Multi-Partner Workspaces. Basic role-based access control. 25 Packages. 90 days collection recovery

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: Org-wide API development with advanced support, security, and control. Everything in Professional, plus: Private API Network. SSO, SCIM, & SAML. Reporting & Analytics. Audit Logs. User Groups. Advanced role-based access control. 100 Packages. 100,000 Mock Server requests. 10,000 Monitor requests. Customer Success

Notes: Popular platform for API development, testing, collaboration, and documentation

Pricing.Name: Hobby
Pricing.Description: All API designing, debugging, mocking and collaboration. Unlimited collaborators for accounts with 1 project. Unlimited collection runs

Pricing.Name: Pro
Pricing.Description: Everything in Hobby, plus: Unlimited collaborators. Unlimited organizations. Native Git support. RBAC and permissions

Pricing.Name: Enterprise
Pricing.Description: Everything in Pro, plus: Enterprise SSO (SAML, OIDC) & SCIM. Storage control to mandate Cloud, Local or Git. Advanced RBAC for teams. Domain Capture & Invite Control. Self-hosted API mocking. Enterprise support. Kong Professional Services. Custom payment options. Unlimited mock requests

Notes: Similar to Postman, used for designing, debugging, testing, and documenting APIs

Pricing.Name: N/A
Pricing.Description: Pricing is now integrated with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, varies based on usage and features.

Notes: API design, documentation, and testing, now part of Oracle's API Platform

Pricing.Name: N/A
Pricing.Description: Kong Gateway is open-source. Kong Konnect (managed) has tiered pricing based on usage and features.

Notes: Open-source API gateway and management platform, handles routing, security, etc.
